This was my first project as a web developer at Fine. I worked primarily on the front end code, building out the HTML, CSS and JavaScript to drive the user experience for a large, sortable, filterable table with detailed data collected from the exoskeleton device Ekso Bionics had just released to a handful of hospitals around the world. I also helped design and implement some of the database queries and back end logic for the complex search filtering that our client had requested.
